mdMethod.name: snapToEpiWeek
mdMethod.label: getInstance
mdMethod.description: Accepts a date and returns the begining or ending of the epiWeek, whichever is closer

mdMethod.name: snapToMonth
mdMethod.label: getInstance
mdMethod.description: Accepts a date and returns the begining or ending of the month, whichever is closer

mdMethod.name: snapToQuarter
mdMethod.label: getInstance
mdMethod.description: Accepts a date and returns the begining or ending of the quarter, whichever is closer

mdMethod.name: snapToSeason
mdMethod.label: getInstance
mdMethod.description: Accepts a date and returns the begining or ending of the season, whichever is closer
